segments.text: I see the woman standing there, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost amusing how she’s drying that plate, unaware of the chaos brewing around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring dangerously over the sink, yet she doesn’t even glance down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A part of me wants to scream out, to warn her about the growing puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But at the same time, I can’t help but admire her dedication to her chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That knee-length dress and apron make her look so domesticated, so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she believes everything is perfectly under control, not realizing the mess she's creating.
segments.speaker: PAR
